attributes.action: put in place a program like the Coalinga Mental Hospital in California in the uk.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I want to see the government put in place a similar program as the Coalinga Mental Hospital in California, in the uk to keep our children safe. 
Sex offenders take away all rights from the people they abuse,so why is it they get more rights it seems then the victims. Therefore after leaving prison, we should have a place like this to put them and they should be monitored carefuly and NOT released into the community just because their time is served in prison.
This way our streets are safe for our children the next generation of this country.
